name: Spirit of Picture
description:
One day, all the paintings in art galleries around the world will be hidden by a mysterious elf. The World Wizarding Association has decided to solve this problem. You are a member of the Wizarding Association. You will use a magic brush to restore hidden paintings.

The game consists of four different brushes, each with its own special skills.

Game levels change every day, 365 days a year, every day is different.

You can also choose the picture of the mobile phone album as the background picture of the game.
